Recipe.title: InstaPot Nightmare Alfredo
Recipe.Source: Based on an Instant Pot Recipe by "Karli" (Bitner)

section.instruction: In a pot, combine Chicken Broth, Milk, Evaporated Milk and Cream of Mushroom Soup. Stir and set aside.
Slice the Chicken into very thin slices, then cut into segments about 1-2 inches long.
Set InstaPot to Sauté and add Butter. Let it sit until Butter is melted.
Add Chicken and Garlic and sauté until Chicken is cooked. (About 5-10 minutes)
Turn off Sauté on the InstaPot, add liquid and stir well.
Break Fettuccini in half so it fits in InstaPot.
Carefully stir the Pasta in the mixture until it is well covered.
Sprinkle Parmesan Cheese over the top. Don't stir.
Set InstaPot to Pressure Cook for 6 minutes.
When done, turn off InstaPot and let sit for 6 minutes more.
Gently stir the Pasta and serve.

Notes.note: If Pasta is not broken in half and well covered in sauce, it will end up being uncooked or stuck together in yucky clumps.

Modifications.modification: Try topping with something like, Bacon Bits, fresh Italian Parsley, Green Onions, etc.
Try using some other kind of Pasta, such as Linguini, Penne or Rotini. (If using short Pasta, such as Penne or Rotini, there is no need to break it in half.)
To make it extra creamy, replace the Water with Milk.
